message:
SYSTEM: Vadim.pdf: Página 49
November 12, 2015
49
Gravitation and Fitness in Ontology Dynamics
Some Relevant Questions
•
 
Are(n’t) ontologies
 
really(rarely) useful? Aren’t 
these just data structures by another name?
•
 
What if requirements come in different 
languages? Would the Law of Multilingual 
Gravitation be different?
•
 
Is the saturation indicator of OntoElect
 
valid? 
Would any arbitrary collection of documents 
“saturate”
 
if big enough?
•
 
Can we trust automatically generated mappings?
speaker: SYSTEM
